title: Ace Tech Cellular LCD Screen Replacement for iPhone 13 Mini (A2481, A2626, A2629, A2630, A2628) 5.4 inch Touch Screen Display Digitizer Frame Assembly W/Repair Kit
features: COMPATIBLE MODELS - Compatible with iPhone 13 mini 5.4 inch. Model number on the back cover: A2481, A2626, A2629, A2630, A2628

TOOL SET - Every order comes with a replacement screen assembly and a tool set, screen protector and adhesive for a quick and easy install. However, the kit does not include the following Ear Speaker, Front Camera, Proximity Sensor, and LCD Metal Back Plate. Please transfer these from your old screen.
SOLUTION â€“ The repair screen kits can be used to repair or replace faulty screens, display problems, dead pixels, cracked LCD screens and wrong color issues.

QUALITY ASSURANCE - Each assembly is tested before shipping. We take care of all quality-related issues with either REPLACEMENT or REFUND. Please contact our customer support team if you have any issues with the item.
description: This item is only compatible with iPhone 13 mini 5.4 inch. Model number on the back cover: A2481, A2626, A2629, A2630, A2628 The screen replacement does not include the following Ear Speaker, Front Camera, Proximity Sensor, and LCD Metal Back Plate. Please transfer these from your old screen.

Here are some tips during installation:  1. Please disconnect the battery flex cable from the device before installing the new screen. Failure to do will result in the screen not turning on.  2. Do not apply pressure to the corners of the LCD panel.  3. The screws are all different lengths, make sure they are reinstalled back into its original location.  4. Please check the LCD and make sure the flex cable is in good condition and there is no debris on the connector.  5. Be gentle to the flex cable connectors when removing and installing them. DO NOT over-bend or use excessive force which can tear the flex cable.

If problems occur after installation, for example: cannot turn on, no touch, no home button function, flashing, lines on screen etc.  Please make sure flex cable connectors are properly connected to the logicboard and double check all flex cables is in good condition. Then turn off and on the phone.
1 x LCD screen replacement 1 x Repair Tools Set 1 x Tempered Glass Protector 1 x Adhesive
If you find any damage or dissatisfaction after receiving the product, please contact us immediately and do not install the item.
You are welcome to contact us as soon possible and we will provide you with a satisfactory solution.
